name: Old Town Bus Simulator
description:
Old Town Bus Simulator is a unique and immersive game that lets you experience the thrill of being a bus driver in the heart of a city's historic district.

Your mission is to transport passengers from one station to another, weaving through narrow streets and alleyways while taking in the beauty of the city's old town. As a driver of a tourist bus, you must handle the vehicle with utmost care and attention, ensuring a smooth and comfortable ride for your passengers.

The game offers a variety of bus models to choose from, each with its own set of features and handling characteristics.

So, hop on board and experience the thrill of being an Old Town Bus Simulator driver, transporting tourists through the charming and captivating streets of the old town!

Game Features :
- Multiple levels
- Helper arrows
- Limited time
